name: Instant Pot® Honey-Garlic Shrimp from Frozen
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Forget to thaw your shrimp? No problem. Let your multi-functional pressure cooker thaw and cook it for you. The sauce is sweet, sticky, salty, and just the right amount of heat. Serve over rice if desired.
directions: Pour 1 cup water into a multi-functional pressure cooked and place a steamer basket inside
Place frozen shrimp in the steamer basket
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 0 minutes
Allow 10 minutes for pressure to build
Meanwhile, make the sauce by whisking cornstarch and cold water together until smooth
Add soy sauce, honey, garlic, oil, and Sriracha sauce
Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 2 minutes
Remove the steamer basket and set shrimp aside
Pour sauce into the pot and cook until thickened, about 2 minutes
Stir in shrimp until evenly coated
Transfer to serving plates and garnish with green onions
